mainBoard.name: Clockwork Hydra
mainBoard.originalText:
Clockwork Hydra enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever Clockwork Hydra attacks or blocks, remove a +1/+1 counter from it. If you do, Clockwork Hydra deals 1 damage to any target.
{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Clockwork Hydra.

rulings.text: If Clockwork Hydra leaves the battlefield while its trigger is on the stack, you can't remove a +1/+1 counter from it, so it won't deal damage.
If the chosen target is an illegal target by the time Clockwork Hydra's triggered ability tries to resolve, the ability doesn't resolve. You don't remove a counter from Clockwork Hydra.

mainBoard.name: Gearseeker Serpent
mainBoard.originalText:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.
{5}{U}: Gearseeker Serpent can't be blocked this turn.

rulings.text: Gearseeker Serpent's first ability can't reduce the total cost to cast the spell below {U}{U}.
Once Gearseeker Serpent has been blocked, activating its last ability won't cause it to become unblocked.
Once a player has announced that they are casting Gearseeker Serpent, no player may take actions to try to change the number of artifacts its controller controls before the spell's cost is locked in.

The total cost to cast Gearseeker Serpent is locked in before you pay that cost. For example, if you control three artifacts, including one you can sacrifice to add {C}, the total cost of Gearseeker Serpent is {2}{U}{U}. Then you can sacrifice the artifact when you activate mana abilities just before paying the cost.

foreignData.text:
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, se controlli un artefatto, crea una pedina creatura artefatto Tottero 1/1 incolore con volare.
Ogniqualvolta una o più creature artefatto che controlli infliggono danno da combattimento a un giocatore, peschi una carta.

foreignData.name: 飛行機械の諜報網
foreignData.text:
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたがアーティファクトをコントロールしている場合、飛行を持つ無色の１/１の飛行機械・アーティファクト・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。
あなたがコントロールしている１体以上のアーティファクト・クリーチャーがプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、カード１枚を引く。

foreignData.name: 振翼机情报网
foreignData.text:
在你的维持开始时，若你操控神器，则派出一个1/1无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物。
每当由你操控的一个或数个神器生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

mainBoard.name: Thopter Spy Network
mainBoard.originalText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control an artifact, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.

rulings.text: The last ability will trigger, at most, once per combat damage step per player. However, if at least one artifact creature you control has first strike and others don't, or if an artifact creature you control has double strike, the ability could trigger twice per combat: once in each combat damage step.

Thopter Spy Network's first ability has an “intervening ‘if' clause.” That means (1) the ability won't trigger at all unless you control an artifact as your upkeep begins, and (2) the ability will do nothing if you don't control an artifact as it resolves.

mainBoard.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control an artifact, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

mainBoard.flavorText: All the wonders of the natural world in one breathtaking microcosm.

Sowie die Gedeihende Insel ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Blau.

foreignData.flavorText: Todas las maravillas del mundo natural en un microcosmos asombroso.

En cuanto el Islote floreciente entre al campo de batalla, elige un color que no sea azul.

foreignData.flavorText: Toutes les merveilles de la nature dans un microcosme à couper le souffle.

foreignData.flavorText: Tutte le meraviglie della natura in un microcosmo mozzafiato.
